description.ko: 플로라-9은 유기적 생명과 디지털 코드 사이의 경계가 모호해진 미래 지향적인 비전을 나타냅니다. 이 작품은 식물학과 사이버네틱스가 공존하며 데이터 중심의 식물들이 살아있는 네트워크를 형성하는 세계를 보여줍니다.
description.en: FLORA-9 represents a futuristic vision where the boundary between organic life and digital code is blurred. This installation showcases a world where botany and cybernetics coexist, creating a living network of data-driven flora.

prompt: A cinematic, hyper-realistic depiction of FLORA-9, a digital nature sanctuary. The scene features translucent, bio-luminescent flowers with glowing fiber-optic veins, holographic leaves shimmering with scrolling binary data, and crystalline trees that pulse with a soft cyan light. Interconnected neon roots spread across a metallic soil surface, while floating data particles mimic pollen in the air. High-definition, surreal atmosphere, synth-wave aesthetic, 8k resolution.
